title: 'rustc --pretty typed' fails for hello world

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
(edited to update syntax)

Command is

```
rustc --pretty typed hello.rs
```

Code is (hello.rs)

``` rust

/*
 *
 */
fn main() {
    println!("Hello, world");
}

```

Stack trace(some debugging info but not all)


gcc: gcc (Ubuntu/Linaro 4.6.3-1ubuntu5) 4.6.3
